main event: A large rectangular object and 6 or 7 smaller silver objects were observed in the sky over a military base.
interesting points: The smaller objects fell with a fluttering manner, while the larger object followed in a stabilized descent.
The objects were described as being the size of pens and silver in color.
The sighting was observed by a group of military personnel, including pilots and officers, who all provided consistent written reports.
The objects were believed to have landed in an area that was subsequently searched by a helicopter.
The weather was described as having a high ceiling of scattered high cirrus clouds, which may have affected visibility or the search operations.
sighted object: a large rectangular object and 6 or 7 smaller silver objects
witnesses: military personnel, including pilots and officers
